roleset.name: light a controled fire in the path of a wild fire to gain control
roleset.note: BACKBURN-V, BACKBURN-N NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

example.name: backburn-v
example.text: [Fire crews]-1 are continuing *PRO*-1 to backburn at The Cape, near Charters Towers, and expect to have that fire contained by this afternoon.
example.arg: at The Cape, near Charters Towers

example.name: do_backburn-l
example.text: 'Simmo, I want you to go to the intersection near the houses and do a backburn to clear the east side of the road.
example.arg: to clear the east side of the road
